content: your heel section as follows marker 30 34 sts finishing for heel marker 30 34 sts for instep there are now 10 sts for the top and 10 sts for the bottom round 1 k1 m1 work in established 2x2 ribbing to 1 st of the toe section arrange these sts on two needles and before marker m1 k1 sm knit to end of round hold parallel round 2 k1 work new st into ribbing pattern work in graft the top and bottom sts together using kitchener stitch established rib to last 2 sts work new st into ribbing stockinette see stitch guide pattern k1 sm knit to end work new stitch into ribbing pattern you want to keep 444 the flow of the 2x2 ribbing to do this the m1 sts will need to become either a knit or a purl on the following round the m1s on the first increase round will become knit sts the m1s on the next 2 rnds become purl sts then the m1s on the next 2 rnds become knits etc always keep the first and last st of the heel section as knit sts repeat rnds 1 and 2 until the heel section has 54 62 sts or 6 sts fewer than double the original heel section st count the vanilla sock movement page 2 www fiddleknits com pattern is for personal use only do not redistribute changing gauges turn heel note where the center of your heel section is row 1 rs slip 1 knit to 1 st past center of heel easily knit this sock at other gauges examples section ssk k1 turn for an 8 foot working at row 2 slip 1 p3 p2tog p1 turn 6 sts per inch cast on 48 sts row 3 slip 1 knit to 1 st before previous turn 6 25 sts per inch cast on 50 sts there will be a slight gap ssk k1 turn 6 5 sts per inch cast on 54 sts row 4 slip 1 purl to 1 st before previous turn p2tog p1 7 sts per inch cast on 56 sts turn 7 25 sts per inch cast on 58 sts repeat row 3 & 4 until the heel section has its original 8 sts per inch cast on 64 sts number of sts you should end having just completed a ws row 8 5 sts per inch cast on 68 sts knit even until foot measures 1 5 or 16 19 rnds less than desired fi nished length for a 9 foot working at 6 sts per inch cast on 54 sts 6 25 sts per inch cast on 56 sts toe decreases 6 5 sts per inch cast on 58 sts 7 sts per inch cast on 64 sts round 1 *k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 7 75 sts per inch cast on 70 sts repeat from * once more 8 25 sts per inch cast on 74 sts round
